All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BaseDao
BaseDao provides basic database operations including update, delete, find single value, and query rows.
DatabaseConnection
DatabaseConnection provides a method to establish a connection to the MySQL database.
DBUtil
DBUtil provides utility methods for managing database connections and resources.
IndexServlet
IndexServlet handles requests for the index page.
JsonUtil
JsonUtil provides utility methods for converting objects to JSON and sending JSON responses.
LoginAccessFilter
LoginAccessFilter handles access control for the application, ensuring that users are logged in before accessing certain resources.
MemServlet
MemServlet handles requests related to word groups for the current user.
Page<T>
Page represents a paginated list of results.
ReportServlet
ReportServlet handles requests related to displaying test result reports.
ResultInfo<T>
ResultInfo is a generic class used to encapsulate the result of an operation, including a status code, message, and result data.
SignupService
SignupService handles the registration of new users.
SignupServlet
SignupServlet handles user registration requests.
StudyServlet
StudyServlet handles study-related requests, such as starting a study session and saving test results.
TestResult
TestResult represents the result of a test taken by a user.
TestResultDao
TestResultDao handles database operations related to the TestResult entity.
TestResultService
TestResultService handles operations related to test results.
User
User represents a user in the system.
UserDao
UserDao handles database operations related to the User entity.
UserService
UserService handles operations related to user management, such as login, registration, and profile updates.
UserServlet
UserServlet handles user-related operations such as login, logout, profile updates, and registration.
Word
Word represents a word entity in the system.
WordDao
WordDao handles database operations related to the Word entity.
WordGroup
WordGroup represents a group of words in the system.
WordGroupDao
WordGroupDao handles database operations related to the WordGroup entity.
WordGroupService
WordGroupService handles operations related to word groups.
WordGroupServlet
WordGroupServlet handles requests related to word groups such as listing, adding, updating, and deleting groups.
WordsApiService
WordsApiService provides methods to interact with the WordsAPI to get word definitions.
WordService
WordService handles operations related to words and test results.
WordServlet
WordServlet handles requests related to words such as viewing, adding, updating, deleting, and translating words.
